analysis.key_quote: Removing these officials at will weakens the quality of the work agencies can do, and would significantly diminish expertise and quality of scientific work at NIH.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, emphasizing the importance of civil service protections and the need for non-political work in scientific positions. It raises concerns about the potential loss of institutional knowledge and the negative impact on the quality of work due to politicization.
